Connecting.Description: If you just turned on your console this may take up to 20 seconds.
Connecting.Title: Connecting to SysDVR...
Connecting.Troubleshoot1: If you can't get past this screen SysDVR not running
Connecting.Troubleshoot2: Make sure your setup is correct and reboot your console.

Error.FailedToDetectMode: Failed to detect the current SysDVR mode
Error.InvalidMode: The reported SysDVR mode is not valid
Error.NewerVersion: You're using a newer version of SysDVR
Error.OlderVersion: You're using an outdated version of SysDVR
Error.SysmoduleConnectionTroubleshoot:
If you just installed it reboot, otherwise wait a bit and try again.
This is normal if you're using an USB-Only version of SysDVR.
Error.SysmoduleConnectionTroubleshootLink: For support check the troubleshooting page:
Error.TroubleshootBootMode: Try checking your SD card for corruption
Error.VersionTroubleshoot: Please download the latest settings app from github.
Error.NotInstalled: SysDVR is not installed on your console
Error.NotInsalledSecondLine: The file /atmosphere/contents/00FF0000A53BB665/exefs.nsp was not found on your SD card, this means you did not extract the SysDVR zip correctly. Fix the issue then reboot the console.

Guide.GuideTitle: The guide is hosted on Github:

Main.ModeRtsp:
Stream directly to any video player application via RTSP.
Once you enable and apply it open rtsp://{}:6666/ with any video player like mpv or vlc.
This mode doesn't require SysDVR-Client on your PC.
For network modes it's recommended to use a LAN adapter.
Main.ModeTcp:
Stream to the SysDVR-Client application via network. This is more stable than the simple network mode.
To setup SysDVR-Client on your pc refer to the guide on Github
For network modes it's recommended to use a LAN adapter.
Main.ModeUsb:
Use this mode to stream to the SysDVR-Client application via USB.
To setup SysDVR-Client on your pc refer to the guide on Github
Main.OptSetDefault: Set current mode as default on boot

Patches.Description:
dvr-patches are system patches that allow to stream most incompatible games with SysDVR, a few games are reported to crash, you can read mone on the issue tracker on https://github.com/exelix11/dvr-patches.
You can also manually download the zip file from the GitHub repo with a computer.
Patches.LatestVer: You're already using latest version of dvr-patches.
Patches.ParseDownloadFailure: Failed to find the download link for the release
Patches.ParseTagCommitFailure: Failed to find commit for tag
Patches.ParseTagFailure: Failed to parse github tags info
Patches.RebootWarning: To apply the changes you need to reboot your console
Patches.SearchLatestButton: Search for latest patches on GitHub
Patches.Title: dvr-patches manager
